column1:
Changes to Advanced Product Options require clearing local storage.
             Please refresh the page to apply the changes correctly.
column2:
Changes to Advanced Product Options require clearing local storage.
             Please refresh the page to apply the changes correctly.

column1: Collapse Custom Options and Values by Default in Admin Panel
column2: Collapse Custom Options and Values by Default in Admin Panel

column1:
When enabled, custom options and their values on the product edit page in the admin panel will be collapsed by default.
                    This helps reduce the initial JavaScript rendering load, especially when a product has a large number of options.
                    Options will only be rendered when expanded.
column2:
When enabled, custom options and their values on the product edit page in the admin panel will be collapsed by default.
                    This helps reduce the initial JavaScript rendering load, especially when a product has a large number of options.
                    Options will only be rendered when expanded.

column1: Number of Custom Options per Page
column2: Number of Custom Options per Page

column1: Set the number of custom options displayed per page in the admin panel.
column2: Set the number of custom options displayed per page in the admin panel.

column1: Set the number of option values displayed per page in the admin panel.
column2: Set the number of option values displayed per page in the admin panel.
